subject: This is very urgent! I am Mrs.
body:
This is very urgent! I am Mrs. Julia Dalton. Am presently hospitalized with stage 4 breast cancer. Please pray for me. 
I have an important message for you, reply to this email quickly so that I can give you the important message. 
Thanks & may the good Lord bless you.
Mrs. Julia Dalton.

subject: Re: This is very urgent! I am Mrs.
body:
Hello Mrs. Julia Dalton,

I'm so sorry to hear about your current health situation. I'll definitely keep you in my thoughts and prayers. I hope you're getting the best care possible.

You mentioned that you have an important message for me. Could you please share more details? I'm here to listen.

Best wishes,
Karen
